        // Global variables for data
        let items = [];

        let logoUrl = "https://placehold.co/64x64/E0F2F7/000?text=LOGO"; // Default placeholder logo

        // Get DOM elements

        const companyNameDisplay = document.getElementById('company-name-display');

        const itemFormModalContent = document.getElementById('item-form-modal-content');

        const itemIdInput = document.getElementById('item-id');
        const itemTanggalInput = document.getElementById('item-tanggal');
        const itemNamaBarangInput = document.getElementById('item-nama-barang');
        const itemSatuanInput = document.getElementById('item-satuan');
        const itemHargaBeliInput = document.getElementById('item-harga-beli');

        const itemStokMasukDusKotakZakInput = document.getElementById('item-stok-masuk-dus-kotak-zak');
        const itemStokMasukGalonInput = document.getElementById('item-stok-masuk-galon'); // New input
        const itemStokKeluarBtlBksInput = document.getElementById('item-stok-keluar-btl-bks');
        const itemStokKeluarDusKotakZakInput = document.getElementById('item-stok-keluar-dus-kotak-zak');
        const itemStokKeluarGalonInput = document.getElementById('item-stok-keluar-galon'); // New input
        const itemStokAkhirJumlahInput = document.getElementById('item-stok-akhir-jumlah');
        const itemStokAkhirTotalInput = document.getElementById('item-stok-akhir-total');
        const itemKeteranganInput = document.getElementById('item-keterangan');
        const cancelItemFormBtn = document.getElementById('cancel-item-form-btn');

        // Pengaturan Section elements
        const logoPreviewImg = document.getElementById('logo-preview');
        const logoUploadInput = document.getElementById('logo-upload');
        const companyNameInput = document.getElementById('company-name-input');
        const saveCompanyNameBtn = document.getElementById('save-company-name-btn');

        // Message Modal elements
        const messageModal = document.getElementById('message-modal');
        const messageModalContent = document.getElementById('message-modal-content');
        const messageModalTitle = document.getElementById('message-modal-title');
        const messageModalText = document.getElementById('message-modal-text');
        const messageModalOkBtn = document.getElementById('message-modal-ok-btn');
        const messageModalCancelBtn = document.getElementById('message-modal-cancel-btn');
        let messageModalResolve; // To handle promises for confirmation dialogs

        /**
         * Generates a unique ID for items.
         * @returns {string} A unique ID.
         */
        function generateUUID() {
            return 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx'.replace(/[xy]/g, function(c) {
                var r = Math.random() * 16 | 0, v = c == 'x' ? r : (r & 0x3 | 0x8);
                return v.toString(16);
            });
        }

        /**
         * Saves current state (items, company name, logo URL) to localStorage.
         */
        function saveData() {
            localStorage.setItem('inventoryItems', JSON.stringify(items));
            localStorage.setItem('companyName', companyName);
            localStorage.setItem('companyLogoUrl', logoUrl);
        }

        /**
         * Loads data from localStorage.
         */
        function loadData() {
            const storedItems = localStorage.getItem('inventoryItems');
            const storedCompanyName = localStorage.getItem('companyName');
            const storedLogoUrl = localStorage.getItem('companyLogoUrl');

            if (storedItems) {
                // Parse items and ensure new fields are present for old data
                const loadedItems = JSON.parse(storedItems);
                items = loadedItems.map(item => ({
                    id: item.id,
                    tanggal: item.tanggal || '', // New field
                    namaBarang: item.namaBarang || item.name || '', // Adapt from old 'name'
                    satuan: item.satuan || '', // New field
                    hargaBeli: item.hargaBeli || item.price || 0, // Adapt from old 'price'
                    stokMasukBtlBks: item.stokMasukBtlBks || 0, // New field
                    stokMasukDusKotakZak: item.stokMasukDusKotakZak || 0, // New field
                    stokMasukGalon: item.stokMasukGalon || 0, // New field
                    stokKeluarBtlBks: item.stokKeluarBtlBks || 0, // New field
                    stokKeluarDusKotakZak: item.stokKeluarDusKotakZak || 0, // New field
                    stokKeluarGalon: item.stokKeluarGalon || 0, // New field
                    stokAkhirJumlah: item.stokAkhirJumlah || item.quantity || 0, // Adapt from old 'quantity'
                    stokAkhirTotal: item.stokAkhirTotal || 0, // New field
                    keterangan: item.keterangan || item.description || '' // Adapt from old 'description'
                }));
            }
            if (storedCompanyName) {
                companyName = storedCompanyName;
            }
            if (storedLogoUrl) {
                logoUrl = storedLogoUrl;
            }
        }

        /**
         * Displays a custom modal message.
         * @param {string} title - The title of the message.
         * @param {string} message - The message content.
         * @param {boolean} isConfirm - True if it's a confirmation dialog, false for alert.
         * @returns {Promise<boolean>} Resolves to true if OK is clicked, false if Cancel is clicked (for confirm).
         */
        function showMessage(title, message, isConfirm = false) {
            messageModalTitle.textContent = title;
            messageModalText.textContent = message;
            messageModalCancelBtn.classList.toggle('hidden', !isConfirm);
            messageModalOkBtn.textContent = isConfirm ? 'Konfirmasi' : 'OK';

            // Show modal with animation
            messageModal.classList.remove('hidden');
            setTimeout(() => {
                messageModalContent.classList.remove('scale-95', 'opacity-0');
                messageModalContent.classList.add('scale-100', 'opacity-100');
            }, 10); // Small delay for transition

            return new Promise(resolve => {
                messageModalResolve = resolve;
            });
        }

        /**
         * Hides the message modal.
         */
        function hideMessage() {
            messageModalContent.classList.remove('scale-100', 'opacity-100');
            messageModalContent.classList.add('scale-95', 'opacity-0');
            setTimeout(() => {
                messageModal.classList.add('hidden');
            }, 300); // Wait for transition to finish
        }

        /**
         * Renders the list of items in the table.
         */
        function renderItems() {
            itemsTableBody.innerHTML = ''; // Clear existing rows

            if (items.length === 0) {
                itemsTableBody.innerHTML = `
                    <tr>
                        <td colspan="15" class="px-4 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-500 text-center">Tidak ada data stok barang.</td>
                    </tr>
                `;
                return;
            }

            items.forEach((item, index) => {
                const row = document.createElement('tr');
                row.className = 'hover:bg-gray-50';
                row.innerHTML = `
                    <td class="px-3 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm font-medium text-gray-900">${index + 1}</td>
                    <td class="px-3 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-500">${item.tanggal}</td>
                    <td class="px-3 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-900">${item.namaBarang}</td>
                    <td class="px-3 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-500">${item.satuan}</td>
                    <td class="px-3 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-500">Rp ${parseFloat(item.hargaBeli).toLocaleString('id-ID')}</td>
                    <td class="px-3 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-500 text-center">${item.stokMasukBtlBks}</td>
                    <td class="px-3 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-500 text-center">${item.stokMasukDusKotakZak}</td>
                    <td class="px-3 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-500 text-center">${item.stokMasukGalon}</td>
                    <td class="px-3 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-500 text-center">${item.stokKeluarBtlBks}</td>
                    <td class="px-3 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-500 text-center">${item.stokKeluarDusKotakZak}</td>
                    <td class="px-3 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-500 text-center">${item.stokKeluarGalon}</td>
                    <td class="px-3 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-500 text-center">${item.stokAkhirJumlah}</td>
                    <td class="px-3 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-500 text-center">Rp ${parseFloat(item.stokAkhirTotal).toLocaleString('id-ID')}</td>
                    <td class="px-3 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-500">${item.keterangan}</td>
                    <td class="px-3 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm font-medium">
                        <button data-id="${item.id}" class="edit-btn text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-900 mr-3 transition-colors duration-200">Edit</button>
                        <button data-id="${item.id}" class="delete-btn text-red-600 hover:text-red-900 transition-colors duration-200">Hapus</button>
                    </td>
                `;
                itemsTableBody.appendChild(row);
            });

            // Attach event listeners for edit and delete buttons
            document.querySelectorAll('.edit-btn').forEach(button => {
                button.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                    const id = e.target.dataset.id;
                    const itemToEdit = items.find(item => item.id === id);
                    if (itemToEdit) {
                        showItemForm(itemToEdit);
                    }
                });
            });

            document.querySelectorAll('.delete-btn').forEach(button => {
                button.addEventListener('click', async (e) => {
                    const id = e.target.dataset.id;
                    const confirmed = await showMessage('Konfirmasi Hapus', 'Apakah Anda yakin ingin menghapus baris data ini?', true);
                    if (confirmed) {
                        deleteItem(id);
                    }
                });
            });
        }

        /**
         * Shows the item form modal, pre-filling if an item object is provided for editing.
         * @param {object} item - The item object to pre-fill the form (optional).
         */
        function showItemForm(item = null) {
            itemForm.reset(); // Clear form fields
            if (item) {
                itemFormTitle.textContent = 'Edit Baris Data Stok';
                itemIdInput.value = item.id;
                itemTanggalInput.value = item.tanggal;
                itemNamaBarangInput.value = item.namaBarang;
                itemSatuanInput.value = item.satuan;
                itemHargaBeliInput.value = item.hargaBeli;
                itemStokMasukBtlBksInput.value = item.stokMasukBtlBks;
                itemStokMasukDusKotakZakInput.value = item.stokMasukDusKotakZak;
                itemStokMasukGalonInput.value = item.stokMasukGalon; // Set new input value
                itemStokKeluarBtlBksInput.value = item.stokKeluarBtlBks;
                itemStokKeluarDusKotakZakInput.value = item.stokKeluarDusKotakZak;
                itemStokKeluarGalonInput.value = item.stokKeluarGalon; // Set new input value
                itemStokAkhirJumlahInput.value = item.stokAkhirJumlah;
                itemStokAkhirTotalInput.value = item.stokAkhirTotal;
                itemKeteranganInput.value = item.keterangan;
            } else {
                itemFormTitle.textContent = 'Tambah Baris Data Stok Baru';
                itemIdInput.value = ''; // Ensure no ID for new item
                // Set default date to today for new entries
                itemTanggalInput.value = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];
            }

            // Show modal with animation
            itemFormModal.classList.remove('hidden');
            setTimeout(() => {
                itemFormModalContent.classList.remove('scale-95', 'opacity-0');
                itemFormModalContent.classList.add('scale-100', 'opacity-100');
            }, 10); // Small delay for transition
        }

        /**
         * Hides the item form modal.
         */
        function hideItemForm() {
            itemFormModalContent.classList.remove('scale-100', 'opacity-100');
            itemFormModalContent.classList.add('scale-95', 'opacity-0');
            setTimeout(() => {
                itemFormModal.classList.add('hidden');
            }, 300); // Wait for transition to finish
        }

        /**
         * Handles the submission of the item form (add or edit).
         * @param {Event} e - The form submission event.
         */
        function saveItem(e) {
            e.preventDefault();

            const id = itemIdInput.value;
            const tanggal = itemTanggalInput.value;
            const namaBarang = itemNamaBarangInput.value.trim();
            const satuan = itemSatuanInput.value.trim();
            const hargaBeli = parseFloat(itemHargaBeliInput.value);
            const stokMasukBtlBks = parseInt(itemStokMasukBtlBksInput.value || 0);
            const stokMasukDusKotakZak = parseInt(itemStokMasukDusKotakZakInput.value || 0);
            const stokMasukGalon = parseInt(itemStokMasukGalonInput.value || 0); // Get new input value
            const stokKeluarBtlBks = parseInt(itemStokKeluarBtlBksInput.value || 0);
            const stokKeluarDusKotakZak = parseInt(itemStokKeluarDusKotakZakInput.value || 0);
            const stokKeluarGalon = parseInt(itemStokKeluarGalonInput.value || 0); // Get new input value
            const stokAkhirJumlah = parseInt(itemStokAkhirJumlahInput.value || 0);
            const stokAkhirTotal = parseFloat(itemStokAkhirTotalInput.value || 0);
            const keterangan = itemKeteranganInput.value.trim();

            if (!tanggal || !namaBarang || !satuan || isNaN(hargaBeli) || hargaBeli < 0) {
                showMessage('Error', 'Harap isi semua kolom yang wajib (Tanggal, Nama Barang, Satuan, Harga Beli) dan pastikan harga beli adalah angka positif.');
                return;
            }

            const newItemData = {
                tanggal,
                namaBarang,
                satuan,
                hargaBeli,
                stokMasukBtlBks,
                stokMasukDusKotakZak,
                stokMasukGalon, // Include new field
                stokKeluarBtlBks,
                stokKeluarDusKotakZak,
                stokKeluarGalon, // Include new field
                stokAkhirJumlah,
                stokAkhirTotal,
                keterangan
            };

            if (id) {
                // Edit existing item
                const itemIndex = items.findIndex(item => item.id === id);
                if (itemIndex > -1) {
                    items[itemIndex] = { ...items[itemIndex], ...newItemData }; // Merge existing with new data
                    showMessage('Sukses', 'Data barang berhasil diperbarui!');
                } else {
                    showMessage('Error', 'Data barang tidak ditemukan.');
                }
            } else {
                // Add new item
                const newItem = {
                    id: generateUUID(),
                    ...newItemData
                };
                items.push(newItem);
                showMessage('Sukses', 'Data barang berhasil ditambahkan!');
            }

            saveData();
            renderItems();
            hideItemForm();
        }

        /**
         * Deletes an item by its ID.
         * @param {string} id - The ID of the item to delete.
         */
        function deleteItem(id) {
            const initialLength = items.length;
            items = items.filter(item => item.id !== id);
            if (items.length < initialLength) {
                saveData();
                renderItems();
                showMessage('Sukses', 'Baris data berhasil dihapus.');
            } else {
                showMessage('Error', 'Baris data tidak ditemukan.');
            }
            hideMessage(); // Hide confirmation modal after action
        }

        /**
         * Handles logo file upload and updates the logo.
         * @param {Event} e - The file input change event.
         */
        function handleLogoUpload(e) {
            const file = e.target.files[0];
            if (file) {
                if (file.size > 2 * 1024 * 1024) { // 2MB limit
                    showMessage('Error', 'Ukuran file terlalu besar. Maksimal 2MB.');
                    e.target.value = ''; // Clear the input
                    return;
                }

                const reader = new FileReader();
                reader.onload = (event) => {
                    logoUrl = event.target.result;
                    companyLogoImg.src = logoUrl;
                    logoPreviewImg.src = logoUrl;
                    saveData();
                    showMessage('Sukses', 'Logo perusahaan berhasil diperbarui!');
                };
                reader.onerror = () => {
                    showMessage('Error', 'Gagal membaca file logo.');
                };
                reader.readAsDataURL(file);
            }
        }

        /**
         * Updates the company name.
         */
        function updateCompanyName() {
            const newName = companyNameInput.value.trim();
            if (newName) {
                companyName = newName;
                companyNameDisplay.textContent = newName;
                saveData();
                showMessage('Sukses', 'Nama perusahaan berhasil diperbarui!');
            } else {
                showMessage('Peringatan', 'Nama perusahaan tidak boleh kosong.');
            }
        }

        /**
         * Initializes the application: loads data, renders UI, attaches event listeners.
         */
        function initApp() {
            loadData(); // Load data from localStorage

            // Update header and settings with loaded data
            companyLogoImg.src = logoUrl;
            companyNameDisplay.textContent = companyName;
            logoPreviewImg.src = logoUrl;
            companyNameInput.value = companyName;

            renderItems(); // Render initial item list

            // Event Listeners for Navigation
            navBarangBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                barangSection.classList.remove('hidden');
                pengaturanSection.classList.add('hidden');
                navBarangBtn.classList.add('bg-blue-600', 'text-white');
                navBarangBtn.classList.remove('bg-gray-200', 'text-gray-700');
                navPengaturanBtn.classList.remove('bg-blue-600', 'text-white');
                navPengaturanBtn.classList.add('bg-gray-200', 'text-gray-700');
            });

            navPengaturanBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                pengaturanSection.classList.remove('hidden');
                barangSection.classList.add('hidden');
                navPengaturanBtn.classList.add('bg-blue-600', 'text-white');
                navPengaturanBtn.classList.remove('bg-gray-200', 'text-gray-700');
                navBarangBtn.classList.remove('bg-blue-600', 'text-white');
                navBarangBtn.classList.add('bg-gray-200', 'text-gray-700');
            });

            // Event Listener for Add Item Button
            addItemBtn.addEventListener('click', () => showItemForm());

            // Event Listeners for Item Form Modal
            itemForm.addEventListener('submit', saveItem);
            cancelItemFormBtn.addEventListener('click', hideItemForm);
            itemFormModal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                if (e.target === itemFormModal) { // Close if clicked outside the content
                    hideItemForm();
                }
            });

            // Event Listeners for Pengaturan Section
            logoUploadInput.addEventListener('change', handleLogoUpload);
            saveCompanyNameBtn.addEventListener('click', updateCompanyName);

            // Event Listeners for Message Modal
            messageModalOkBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                hideMessage();
                if (messageModalResolve) {
                    messageModalResolve(true);
                }
            });
            messageModalCancelBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                hideMessage();
                if (messageModalResolve) {
                    messageModalResolve(false);
                }
            });
            messageModal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                if (e.target === messageModal) { // Close if clicked outside the content
                    hideMessage();
                    if (messageModalResolve && messageModalCancelBtn.classList.contains('hidden')) { // Only resolve if it's an alert, not a confirm
                        messageModalResolve(true);
                    } else if (messageModalResolve) {
                         messageModalResolve(false); // If it's a confirm and clicked outside, treat as cancel
                    }
                }
            });
        }

        // Initialize the application when the DOM is fully loaded
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initApp);
    </script>



</body></html>
